metadata.title: SlashNext Security Events for Microsoft Sentinel - Get customer incidents and log
metadata.description: The playbook will run after every 3 mintues to get list of events occured to a customer in that time and log them in Log Analytic Workspace.
prerequisites: 1.**SlashNext Logic Apps Connector** supports **Basic** authentication, while creating connection you will be asked to provide API key.
To acquire SlashNext API key, please contact us at [support@slashnext.com](mailto:support@slashnext.com) or visit [SlashNext.com](www.slashnext.com)
2. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Azure log analytic workspace needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
3. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Azure storage account needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
4. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Inside storage account create a container named as offset.
postDeployment: 2. Authorize SlashNext custom connector using SlashNext customer key.

releaseNotes.title: SlashNext Security Events for Microsoft Sentinel

metadata.description: Name of Storage account to be created.
Primary or secondary key of storage account
Previous week from which scanning should start.
Primary or secondary key of storage account

api.name: SlashNext-CMS
api.description: SlashNext-CMS is the integration API for Azure, it provide insight of the events occured on endpoint of a customer

inputs.body:
{
"Targeted User":"@{items('Extract_Details')['fullname']}",
"Targeted User Email":"@{items('Extract_Details')['email']}",
"Title": "@{body('Parse_Email_Threat')?['data']?['user']?['title']}",
"User Group":"@{items('Extract_Details')['groupname']}",
"Department": "@{items('Extract_Details')['department']}",
"Infection Vector":"@{items('Extract_Details')['infectionvector']}",
"Sender Email" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['sender_email']}",
"Email Subject": "@{replace(items('Extract_Details')['email_subject'],'\','\\')}",
"Email Time" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['email_time']}",
"Incident Time":"@{items('Extract_Details')['incidenttime']}",
"Email From - Display Name" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['emailfrom_name']}",
"Email From - Email" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['emailfrom_email']}",
"Threat Type":"@{items('Extract_Details')['threattype']}",
"Threat Name":"@{items('Extract_Details')['threatname']}",
"Detected Via":"@{items('Extract_Details')['eptypeText']}",
"Remediation Action" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['remediation_action']}",
"Impersonation": "@{items('Extract_Details')['isimpersonated']}",
"VIP" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['isvip']}",
"Has Attachment" : "@{body('Parse_Email_Threat')?['data']?['threat']?['has_attachment']}",
"Has URL" : "@{items('Extract_Details')['hasurl']}",
"Total User Incident": "@{items('Extract_Details')['totalincidents']}",
"User Risk Score" : "@{body('Parse_Email_Threat')?['data']?['user']?['userRiskScore']}"
}

{

"Targeted User Email":"@{items('Extract_Details')['email']}",

"User Risk Score" : "@{body('Parse_Threat')?['data']?['user']?['userRiskScore']}"
